version_description:
1.性能优化
2.修复部分问题。

1.牛吧更名为千牛头条，优化资讯浏览体验
2.优化服务搜索体验

1.优化工作台交互体验，工具插件使用更流畅   
2.新增NEW、HOT和新订插件标识，方便快速查找  
3.优化消息模块部分细节体验

1. 新增单聊中发送小视频的功能
2. 升级群聊功能，添加群成员更简单，群设置项与PC同步
3. 优化会话界面，更舒服的会话体验
修复遗留问题，优化性能。
修复在iOS10下手机发烫的问题

1、  服务市场新增客服外包、页面设计、看图拍等服务
2、  千牛头条新增直播频道及双11频道

1、修复挂起状态同步问题；
2、优化店铺评分展示；
3、Bug fix；

1. 优化工作台/消息视觉体验
2. 千牛头条优化频道阅读体验，增强内容个性化推荐 
3. 修复上个版本遗留问题

1、优化消息到达率，消息到达更及时；
2、修复遗留问题，更稳定，更高效；

1、修复消息提示音问题；
2、修复闪退问题；
3、优化消息到达率；

1.优化消息提醒文案
2.千牛头条直播全新观看体验，互动评论更顺畅
3.千牛头条直播新增互动卡片

新的一年，恭祝各位商家生意兴隆，店铺大卖。

----本次更新----
【新增】 直播中实时显示字幕，不错过任何重要信息 
【新增】 支持VR直播，观看直播时身临其境

【优化】工作台数字体验优化，数字分类更清晰更直观
【优化】消息卡片视觉体验优化，页面展示更流畅
【修复】修复了快捷短语问题，客服接待更加方便
【修复】修复一些已知问题，提升整体体验

【新增】全景图拍摄新增防抖技术，视频拍摄更清晰；
【优化】大幅提升启动速度，启动更流畅；
【优化】优化头像修改后同步机制，保证头像及时更新同步
【修复】修复头条消息推送点击无法定位详情问题
【修复】修复旺旺系统消息高度显示错乱问题
【修复】解决iOS 10系统下系统状态栏千牛数据展示问题
We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available Alibaba Workbench features. Thanks for using Alibaba Workbench!

1、Optimize the frequency of beeps when receiving a large number of messages.
2、Bug fixed: You receive the push notification of your previous account even after logging out.
3、Fix part of the problem that you cannot receive the push notification.
4、Optimize the UI of the Q&A module and the Task module on the workbench.
Optimize the automatic logout problem of multiple accounts in the background.
Fixed the problem of not being able to enter the home page of qianniu after opening shop.

[optimization] optimize part of the worktable jam problem.

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you:
[feature] when operating is limited, the sub-account can initiate authorization from the main account.
[feature] manage the pictures in your cloud storage.
[optimization] fix some crash issue.
Good luck with your business on 2021 !

We update the app regularly so we can make it better for you:
[optimization] fix some experience problems.
Good luck with your business on 2021 !

1.Support signing with SIM card phone number and face scanning
2.Improve user experience and fix some bugs

1.Redesign the sidebar，improve the user experience of switching account and management
2.Click the store name in the sidebar to enter the store information page, you can modify the store logo and store name (only taobao store can modify the store name)
3.Improve user experience and fix some bugs

1.Redesign the sidebar, show the name and logo of store, improve the user experience of account management
2.Fix some bugs, such as stuck and crash

1.Optimized the global search page
2.Optimized the icon of the recent bill status, on the top right in the chatting page
3.Shortcut phrases can be used in chatting, different consumer service accounts can manage them separately
4.Part of the sales activities can be enrolled on Qianniu App
5.Optimized sidebar settings, "shops", "accounts", and "messages" related settings were added into menu
6.Improve running performance

1.When chatting, you can use recommended shortcut phrases in the order of frequency, thus enhancing your customer service efficacy.
2.When choosing shortcut phrases, you can search and select them by use history.
3.When chatting, you can recommend merchants of your shop to customers.

Update content:
1. Optimize the system message classification, with more detailed classifications under the four major types
2. In the Marketing Tab, you can see ’11.11‘ Global Shopping Festival Entrance 
3. Optimize the performance of the Toutiao live details page
4. The mobile phone verification code for login is shortened to 4 digits
5. Optimize the customer feedback process

1、Support inviting the customer to submit order on the chatting window
2、The system message can be marked as 'read'
3、Improve the stability

1. The 'hot searches' and 'related searches' can make the search function more accurate and stable. And the 'FAQ search' will show you the answer.
2. When you are managing your goods, you can filter goods by category、range of price or sales.
3. You can quickly switch to the evaluation page when you are managing your orders.
Add e-commerce learning content recommendation to the workbench
1.Fix some bugs, such as stuck and crash

1、You can share or visit your store quickly on the top right of the workbench
2、Support copying the seller code of your product, in the product managing page
3、Fix some bugs of message

1. Optimize the search function
2. Optimized some stalling and offline problems when chatting
3. The contact blacklist, will be effective for all the sub accounts
4. You can edit the price、inventory、merchant code on the product list page

The auto reply function is removed，please use the greeting words function instead.
fix some issue.

1. The official order management tool supports you to filter out after-sales orders that are about to expire
2. The coupon tool supports you to create and manage commodity coupons
3. Optimize the search of messages and contacts

The automatic reply function is down, you can use the greeting words function instead.

1. Support searching orders by the package number
2. You can watch the Toutiao live show in landscape mode
3. Add some tests in the Toutiao courses
4. Some pages support 'big font mode', turn on it through“sidebar→setting→font size setting”

The automatic reply function is down, you can use the greeting words function instead.
